participant_1.background:
My favorite ice cream is pistachio.
Traveling and making friends is something i find delightful.
I like watching videos of surgery.

participant_2.background:
My favorite music genre is classical.
I play many instruments.
I like to travel.
I give lessons on string instruments.

content.text: Hi, my name is participant_1.
Hi, I'm participant_2.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to travel, play classical music, and give lessons on string instruments.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to travel too, and I love listening to classical music.
What's your favorite genre of classical music?
I like all kinds of classical music, but I especially like romantic music.
Romantic music is great! I love how it can be so passionate and emotional.
Me too! I think it's the perfect music to listen to when you're feeling romantic.
I agree! What's your favorite romantic piece of music?
I have a few favorites, but one of my favorites is "Liebestraum" by Franz Liszt.
"Liebestraum" is a beautiful piece of music. I love the way it builds up to a crescendo and then melts away into a beautiful melody.
Me too! It's such a moving piece of music.
Do you play any instruments?
No, I don't play any instruments.
That's too bad! I play a lot of instruments, but my favorite is the violin.
The violin is a beautiful instrument. I love the sound of it.
Me too! It's such a versatile instrument. You can play anything from classical music to pop music to rock music.
I'm sure you're a very talented violinist.
Thank you! I'm glad you think so.
